summary: MY COMPLAINT IS  HARLEY-DAVIDSON  MOTORCYCLE MANUFACTURING COMPANY KNOWINGLY MANUFACTURED  UNSAFE  PARTS THAT SUPPORTED THE STRUCTURAL INTEGRITY OF THE BAT WING FAIRING MOUNTED TO THE FRONT SUSPENSION OF ALL TOURING  MODEL MOTORCYCLES MANUFACTURED FROM 2006  TILL 2009.  HARLEY DAVIDSON SHOWED BAD FAITH AND THE FACT THAT NO MANUFACTURE  SAFETY RECALL OR BEST PRACTICES NOTIFICATION WERE ATTEMPTED.  I'M HOPING THAT THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT WILL HOLD  HARLEY-DAVIDSON ACCOUNTABLE FOR THEIR UNSAFE ACT. [XXX]    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR

2006 HARLEY DAVIDSON FLHXI MIRRORS VIBRATE TO THE POINT YOU CAN NOT SEE ANYTHING WITH THEM. THE SUPPORT BRACKET INSIDE THE FAIRING BROKEN WHERE UPPER SCREW GOES THREW BRACKET AND INTO FAIRING. HARLEY DAVIDSON HAS COME OUT WITH A NEW BRACKET BUT WILL NOT ISSUE A RECALL BECAUSE THEY FEEL IT IS NOT A SAFETY ISSUE. IF IT WAS NOT A SAFETY ISSUE THEN WHY DOES THE STATE OF MARYLAND STATE YOU MUST HAVE THEM ON THE MOTORCYCLE. *TR

2006 HARLEY DAVIDSON FLHXI  INNER CAM BEARINGS FAILURE AT 27,000 MILES CAUSING THE CRANK SHAFT TO BE DESTROYED DUE TO THE FAILURE OF THE INNER CAM BEARINGS, DESTROYING THE MOTOR. PURCHASED BIKE WITH ONLY 1,912 MILES ON IT.  *TR

2006 HARLEY FLHXI WITH VIBRATIONS IN THE FRONT WHEEL. CONSUMER STATES THAT THE VIBRATION COMES FROM THE FRONT WHEEL DURING BRAKING.  *KB  THE CONSUMER WAS INFORMED THE BRAKE ROTORS WERE WARPED AND THE CONDITION WAS FAIR WEAR AND TEAR.
